statements: SELECT * FROM dna_evidence;
SELECT sample_id, dna_sequence FROM dna_evidence WHERE evidence_type = 'hair';
SELECT * FROM dna_evidence WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT dna_sequence, sample_id FROM dna_evidence WHERE crime_scene_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT crime_scene_id FROM dna_evidence;
SELECT sample_id, dna_sequence FROM dna_evidence WHERE crime_scene_id = 'abc123' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM dna_evidence WHERE evidence_type = 'blood' ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
SELECT sample_id, dna_sequence, collection_date FROM dna_evidence WHERE dna_sequence LIKE '%AGCT%' AND collection_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, crime_scene_id, evidence_type FROM dna_evidence WHERE crime_scene_id IN ('xyz456', 'def789') AND evidence_type <> 'hair' ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_samples, evidence_type FROM dna_evidence GROUP BY evidence_type HAVING total_samples > 2 ORDER BY total_samples DESC;
SELECT * FROM crime_scenes;
SELECT location FROM crime_scenes WHERE evidence_found = TRUE;
SELECT id, location FROM crime_scenes WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM dna_samples WHERE sample_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_id, suspect_id FROM dna_samples WHERE dna_sequence IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM crime_scenes ORDER BY location DESC, id ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM crime_scenes GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT c.location, d.sample_date FROM crime_scenes c JOIN dna_samples d ON c.id = d.crime_scene_id WHERE d.sample_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.location, d.dna_sequence FROM crime_scenes c LEFT JOIN dna_samples d ON c.id = d.crime_scene_id WHERE d.dna_sequence IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(sample_date), MIN(sample_date) FROM dna_samples WHERE suspect_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM crime_scene_evidence;
SELECT crime_scene_id, dna_evidence FROM crime_scene_evidence WHERE crime_scene_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT suspect_id, name, age, gender FROM suspect_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT report_id, analysis_results FROM forensic_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM crime_scene_evidence;
SELECT suspect_id, name, gender FROM suspect_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT report_details FROM forensic_reports WHERE suspect_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM crime_scene_evidence JOIN forensic_reports ON crime_scene_evidence.crime_scene_id = forensic_reports.crime_scene_id;
SELECT name, age, gender, analysis_results FROM suspect_profiles INNER JOIN forensic_reports ON suspect_profiles.suspect_id = forensic_reports.suspect_id WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT * FROM crime_scenes;
SELECT location, evidence_collected FROM crime_scenes WHERE case_number = 123;
SELECT name, gender, age FROM suspects WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM investigators WHERE specialization = 'Forensic Science';
SELECT type, description FROM evidence ORDER BY evidence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM crime_scenes WHERE location = 'Downtown' ORDER BY case_number DESC;
SELECT case_number, location FROM crime_scenes WHERE case_number = 1001;
SELECT * FROM suspects WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, specialization FROM investigators WHERE specialization IS NOT NULL;
SELECT e.evidence_id, e.type, c.location FROM evidence e JOIN crime_scenes c ON e.case_number = c.case_number;
SELECT * FROM CrimeSceneEvidence;
SELECT evidence_id, evidence_type, collected_date FROM CrimeSceneEvidence;
SELECT * FROM DNAProfiles WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, height FROM Suspects ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT scientist_id, name, specialization FROM ForensicScientists WHERE lab_location = 'Laboratory A';
SELECT * FROM CrimeSceneEvidence ORDER BY evidence_id DESC, collected_date ASC
SELECT profile_id, dna_sequence FROM DNAProfiles WHERE analysis_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT name, height FROM Suspects WHERE height > 170
SELECT * FROM Matches WHERE match_confidence BETWEEN 80 AND 100
SELECT name, specialization FROM ForensicScientists
